casebody.data:
Estate of Ashley Nichole Bouher, Jennifer S. Bouher, Richard A. Bouher
v.
Giftwares Co., Inc., Consolidated Rail Corporation Pennsylvania Lines, LLC., Barry Dickman, Gregg Dickman, Mitchell Dickman, Giftwares Assoc., Norfolk Southern Railway Company, Royersford Borough, Patrick J. Sullivan; Petition of Giftwares Co., Inc., Consolidated Rail Corporation Pennsylvania Lines, LLC., Barry Dickman, Gregg Dickman, Mitchell Dickman, Giftwares Assoc., Norfolk14 NO. 78 MAL 2016 Supreme Court of Pennsylvania June 22, 2016 Appeal from the Superior Court.

Disposition: Denied.

Justice DONOHUE and WECHT did not participate in the consideration or decision of this matter.
